text: First Monday in October is a 1981 American comedy drama movie directed by Ronald Neame and based on the play of the same name by Jerome Lawrence and Robert E. Lee. It stars Walter Matthau, Jill Clayburgh, Barnard Hughes, Jan Sterling in her final feature movie role and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1981 drama movies Category:1980s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Ronald Neame Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: First Monday in October
